vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἠσαῦ, ὁ
indecl. (Heb. עֵשָׂו, Gen.25:25),
Esau: Rom.9:13 (LXX) Heb.11:20 12:16.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以掃 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來字的意思是 "多毛的"
原為以撒的長子, 雅各的雙胞胎兄長
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以扫 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来字的意思是 "多毛的"
原为以撒的长子, 雅各的双胞胎兄长
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Ê-sau. Chữ «Ê-sau» phát âm cũng gần với chữ «nhiều lông» hay «lông lá» trong tiếng Hê-bơ-rơ. Xem H6215

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Esau
§ Esau, "hairy"
Esau, (Proper name), indeclinable (Gen. 27-28), Rom. 9:13;
